column1: in memory of robert j. beshara -- gary kelley's add'vantage funeral and cremation service| first: last: robert j. beshara october 5
column4: 83 year old resident of locust grove
column6: 2015 in locus grove. he was born october 5
column7: 1931 to thomas and sally (cole) beshara in haskell
column8: oklahoma. mr. beshara served in the united states navy
column9: his civilian occupation was as an electrical engineer. the family will hold a private memorial service. condolences may be posted to the guestbook located on this page. photographs and may also be submitted to this online memorial. gary kelley'sadd'vantage funeral and cremation service9761 east 31st street. tulsa
